review: I received this product on a Saturday and by Sunday morning, it was broken. It kept showing me a "restore Apple TV" message after only using the product once for approximately 2 hours. And what's worse is that the restoring process for Apple TV requires that you purchase a Micro USB cable (that does NOT come with the Apple TV even though it is the only way you can restore it once it's broken). This process is extremely frustrating after I had JUST purchased this device. This is the third Apple TV I've purchased, and I've now had difficulty with all of them. Thinking about switching away from Apple products for this first time in my life due to the constant frustration with their devices!
author: Samantha Gibbons
